#summary This page guides you how to login as administrator

= Login as Administrator =

  # Open !SharePoint site with the following URL 
    * http://SERVERURL/_layouts/settings.aspx
  # Now sharepoint will ask for the credentials.
  # Enter the admin credentials and proceed further.
